column1: #Text=Korra says : " I think I 'm doing it wrong . "
#Text=Look at Meelo ; he 's able to meditate peacefully .
#Text=" Korra says : " Actually , I think he 's asleep .
#Text=Well , at least he has the relaxing part down .
#Text=None of this airbending stuff makes any sense to me .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I know you 're frustrated , but these teachings will sink in over time .
#Text=" Korra says : " Yeah , it 's not sinking in yet .
#Text=I 'm gon na go get a glass of lychee juice .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra , the meditation 's not over yet !
#Text=" Ikki says : " Daddy , can I have some lychee juice too ?
